description:
Takagi-san and Nishikata compare heights to see if Nishikata did indeed grow. 
But as always, her method is unusual and Nishikata can`t help but wonder...
Meanwhile, Yukari is curious about the two because they`re always hanging out together.
Are Takagi-san and Nishikata going out?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Qui est le plus grand ? / La frileuse / Les invitations / Choix à deux options
Who`s Taller? / I Hate the Cold / Invitation / Two-Choice Question
背比べ / 寒がり / お誘い / 二択クイズ
키 재기 / 추위 / 제안 / 선택 퀴즈
